Public Speaking: Prepare Persuasive Presentations

JOIN OVER 1900 STUDENTS IN MY PUBLIC SPEAKING COURSES!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Making effective presentations is a skill that can make or break careers and is crucial to spread messages and ideas (even if you don't buy this course keep it in mind).
This Public Speaking courses helps you deliver better communication by focusing on what matters and avoid common mistakes. There is no schoolbook to follow to be a better presenter but we can take a page from the great communicators.

Almost 50 video lectures and extra available to address public speaking in an engaging and fun way. Those 4 Public Speaking courses covering all the key factors like:

  • Preparation. Check how do you prepare a presentation against the rotated square framework. (THIS MODULE)
  • Delivery. Improve your communication and avoid common pitfalls that can damage your credibility or effectiveness.
  • Visual aids. The vast majority of them hinders speakers rather than support them. Learn why, how to design and use them to your advantage.
  • Engaging, Q&A and Feedback. Get your audience involved from different perspectives, including the emotional one, fundamental for moving people. 

After taking this course you will know exactly how to design and prepare a persuasive presentation. Inside you will find the key questions you should ask yourself, a framework to follow during preparation and the different steps you have to take to craft a speech or a presentation that will resonate with your audience, convey your message and motivate them to an action.

This course can be followed as part of the whole Public Speaking series or as a standalone (you don't need the other three modules). Just before the end take the test to see if you are now mastering the secret of preparing a presentation. The follow the extra lecture on what to read or watch or enrol in one of the other courses.

If you want to move audiences and improve a terrific asset for you and your messages then this is your course!

You will get:

  • Full, free lifetime access
  • 15 lectures and over 1.5 hours of video
  • Downloadable extras to support you in the preparation process
  • All future extra lectures and upgrades are always included for free
  • Unconditional Udemy 30 day money-back guarantee - that's my personal promise of your success!

Effective public speaking boosts your message and your career, don't waste opportunities: enrol now!
